about_the_game:
STΔRLIVHT is a new mixed-media project comprised of music and game releases (2ECONDS TO STΔRLIVHT and NOISZ STΔRLIVHT), which tell the story of a queer idol group who battle musical monsters from another dimension (taking place in the NOISZ universe).

LIVHT MY WΔY / galaXXy brain is the group's first single, a double A-side featuring hard-hitting tracks by Camellia and Nhato, plus remixes by Kurokotei and Neutral Moon.
